definition: either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman, to commit a faux pas or a fault or make a serious mistake
details:
noun
- either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman
= synonyms: titty, knocker, tit, breast, bosom
- an ignorant or foolish person
= synonyms: booby
verb
- to commit a faux pas or a fault or make a serious mistake
= example: to commit a faux pas or a fault or make a serious mistake
= synonyms: blunder
